name: A 40th of Pizza Man
description:
Hey you, have every wanted to play a point and click adventure game

But you don't have any money?

Then go play Day of The Tentacle here.....

........

or you could play this one or something.

Because, I'm making a game:

"A Pizza Man Delivers A Pizza To The Other Side of The Earth"

It's not done yet, but I want my cousin and all of the 2 people who are reading this to have the ability to play the game, and get the word out that this game exists.

So what do I do?

 Release a 40th of the game for free.

Have fun!

Also this was made in AGS (Adventure Game Studio)
